DataElement.preferredName: Recipient Hospital First Discharge Post Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year the recipient was first discharged from hospital post hematopoietic cell transplantation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Recipient Hospital First Discharge Post Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who gets something._An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._The release of a patient from a course of care._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_The replacement of tissue with tissue from the person's own body or from another person._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who gets something.:An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.:Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:In healthcare, discharge represents the end point of an inpatient hospital contact which consists of one or several days of care. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
The release of a patient from a course of care.

Property.preferredName: Post Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: Post; occuring after.:Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.):The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.

Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)
Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created new version associated to different CD and Display Format as part of NMDP Date VD clean up 4/2009. mcooper Corrected def from KM change. AK 3/25/19
